entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:16 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -41.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 07:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -41.3°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -45.5°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 43. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 39.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 39. Wind chill near minus 60. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
